duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement client-centric, action-oriented Relationship Development and Service Plan
Lead and track multiple, complex sets of client relationship activities including RFPs, new business opportunities, client events, and marketing efforts
Review, analyze, understand, and report key client account data including financial, diversity, and other metrics
Plan and lead recurring internal team meetings, managing agenda preparation and tracking follow-up items
Facilitate process and discussions on rate negotiations and financial analyses
Develop and provide regular client relationship reporting focused on key metrics, strategic actions, impact, client satisfaction, etc.
Activate, organize, and oversee the coordination of supporting business services teams including Legal Project Management

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent required. Master’s degree (MBA, MA, MS JD, or other relevant graduate degree) preferred. Minimum of 10 years experience in strategic account management, complex program management, and/or direct client service experience in a professional services environment, or similarly relevant business experience is preferred.
